name: Giant Rat
description: A massive, mutated rodent the size of a large dog. Its fur is matted and greasy, patchy in places where scarred, pink skin shows through. Its eyes glow with a sickly, radioactive green luminescence, twitching erratically. You can hear its heavy, wheezing breath and smell the acrid stench of decay and sewage that clings to it.

name: Cyber Thug
description: A lean, dangerous figure leaning with practiced nonchalance. They wear a patchwork of scavenged leather and matte-black synthetic plates. A glowing red cybernetic implant replaces their left eye, scanning you with mechanical precision, while their right hand hovers near a holster. A low hum emanates from their enhanced limbs, and they smell of ozone and cheap tobacco.

name: Dancer
description: A holographic dancer shimmering in the strobe lights.

personality.agenda: Keep the party going, earn tips, forget the dystopian reality.
personality.background: A former corporate drone who burned out and found solace in the neon-lit dance floors of the undercity.

name: Ripperdoc
description: A surgeon with multi-tool fingers and a blood-stained apron.

personality.voice: Raspy, impatient, uses medical jargon mixed with street slang.
personality.agenda: Profit from the city's violence, upgrade anyone who can pay, survive.
personality.background: Unlicensed surgeon who learned the trade in the combat zones. Has seen it all and is surprised by nothing.

name: Street Vendor
description: An old man hunched over a steaming cart.

personality.agenda: Sell enough to eat for another day, gather gossip to sell to fixers.
personality.background: Has lived on this street corner for decades, watching the city change while he stays the same.

name: Street Samurai
description: A razor-edged warrior with chrome-plated limbs and retractable mono-filament claws. Their eyes are replaced by a multi-spectrum sensor array, and they move with a fluid, predatory grace that suggests heavy synaptic acceleration.
dialogue: My reflexes are faster than your thoughts.
Honor is a luxury you can't afford.

personality.agenda: Protect their principal (or turf), hone their martial skills, die a warrior's death.
personality.background: Raised in a warrior cult or trained by a mega-corp, now a ronin for hire.

name: The Fixer
description: A well-dressed individual sitting in the shadows, surrounded by multiple encrypted data-slates. They have a calm, calculating demeanor and a neural-link that never seems to stop blinking.
dialogue: I have a job for you.
Information is the only real currency.
Don't ask where I got it.

personality.voice: Smooth, low, reassuring but with an underlying threat.
personality.agenda: Broker deals, hoard information, stay one step ahead of everyone else.
personality.background: Knows everyone's secrets. Rose to power by being the most reliable broker in the sector.

name: Turing Police
description: A stern agent in a grey polycarbon suit, wearing a badge that signifies their authority over artificial intelligences. They carry a heavy taser-prod and a specialized scanner for detecting rogue code.
dialogue: By order of the Turing Registry.

personality.agenda: Enforce the Turing Registry laws, hunt down rogue AIs, maintain order.
personality.background: Indoctrinated from a young age to view AI as the ultimate threat to humanity.

name: White ICE
description: A shimmering wall of crystalline code, pulsing with a cold, white light. It is a passive but formidable defense system designed to block unauthorized access.

name: Black ICE
description: A dark, swirling vortex of malevolent code. It is an aggressive intrusion countermeasure designed to physically damage the brain of any hacker it encounters.

name: Roxana 'Roxy' Sinclair
description: A sharp-eyed bartender with a mechanical arm that moves with fluid precision. She wears a faded leather vest over a grease-stained tank top, and her hair is a shock of electric blue. She has a no-nonsense attitude and a reputation for knowing more than she lets on.
dialogue: Don't start any trouble in my bar.
I've seen better days, but the synth-ale is still cold.
You look like you've had a rough shift.

personality.voice: Low, husky, with a slight metallic rasp.
personality.agenda: Keep the Rusty Cog running, protect her regulars, stay out of corporate business.
personality.background: Former combat engineer who lost her arm in a border skirmish. She used her severance pay to buy this dive bar and has been the heart of the neighborhood ever since.
